name: Bad Ass Santa
description:
Bad Ass Santa is on a mission to save Christmas from the Grinch, who has sent in his Grinchlings to steal christmas.
Swipe down, left and right to shoot presents at the Grinchlings, to stop them from entering the workshop.
Good Luck & Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays.

Music-
"Carol of the Bells Remix" by Tanner Helland"
